text: Notre Dame in French is the name give to a number of religious buildings, consecrated to the Virgin Mary. it was burned in the 2019 Notre Dame fire ==Churches and cathedrals in France== *Notre Dame de Paris, probably the most famous *Bayeux Cathedral, called Notre-Dame de Bayeux *Notre-Dame de Chartres *Notre-Dame de la Garde in Marseille *Notre-Dame de Reims *Notre Dame du Haut in Ronchamp *Strasbourg Cathedral, called Notre-Dame de Strasbourg ==Other== *University of Notre Dame in the U.S. state of Indiana *Notre Dame College, Dhaka in Bangladesh *Notre Dame de Paris, the original French title of a novel by Victor Hugo published in 1831. In English, this novel is commonly called The Hunchback of Notre Dame.
title: Notre Dame
